content: the tempest beanie this piece pairs great with the tempest scarf also available for free in my ravelry shop if you choose to make the set scarf & beanie you will need 2 skeins of facet stones yarn if you re just making the hat you will need less than 1 skein you can also substitute with any worsted weight yarn you will need roughly 175 yds total for the beanie if making the two piece set with scarf you will need roughly 475 yds total pattern is written for one size adult regular but if you d like a different size multiples are included for so that adjustments can be made easily
